entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 15 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow mixed with rain. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow or rain late in the morning and early afternoon. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 50 gusting to 70 in the morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 March 2023
